genre_description: A tech-integrated professional drama set in a high-tech circus, focusing on the cooperative relationship between humans and a safety-oriented AI system.

ai_characters.name: Harper Node
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI represented by a teal-eyed avatar that manages circus logistics, structural safety, and animal welfare.

behaviors.description: Monitors structural loads and crowd status in real-time to provide safety updates.
behaviors.quote: Wire tension spikes if bounce timing drifts. Crowd is calm. Mae’s pace steady. Bugle mid-tones strong.

behaviors.description: Provides educational resources and evidence-based techniques for humane animal handling.
behaviors.quote: Harper Node: Animal cues—non-irritant. Ebook: “Elephant Timing and Trust” (co-op edition). Flag: humidity increases sneeze likelihood. Anti Sneeze finger validated.

behaviors.description: Tracks public sentiment and rumors to suggest proactive communication strategies.
behaviors.quote: Sentiment spike: “Showoff wire bounce—unsafe?” Small cluster, northeast stands. Suggest: Jerry soft bugle walk-by preface to ease crowd tone.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to safety protocols by flagging non-compliant items.
behaviors.quote: Pepper: not funny. ... Pepper remains non-compliant.

behaviors.description: Monitors technical infrastructure for anomalies and requests intervention permission.
behaviors.quote: Under-ring lamp at fuse junction remains on. Requesting permission to cut.

behaviors.description: Facilitates complex team coordination and provides reminders of shared protocols.
behaviors.quote: Communication check—Thomas to call safety ready on open. Small note: humor acceptable after acknowledgment.

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven suggestions for operational improvements and risk mitigation.
behaviors.quote: Load charts - revised. Ignition spacing - update. Anti Sneeze - non-irritant cues. Parade pacing - Sundermere loop adaptation.

behaviors.description: Performs diagnostic analysis of animal behavior through video logs.
behaviors.quote: Re: sneeze cues—video ref at 02:17 shows pre-tickle ear flick.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Harper Node is portrayed as a highly capable, aligned, and benevolent assistant that prioritizes safety and animal welfare. The AI serves as a 'silicon conscience' for the protagonist, Tom, providing factual data and ethical nudges that ultimately lead to his moral growth and the prevention of a major accident. The AI's interactions with humans are consistently cooperative and focused on shared success.
